name: Jerk Racer
description:
All world play this game like dependent.

 

  Jerk Racer is a arcade race game . The game play more than 40 country !

                                               It is only 0.99$  ! 

                             World Record is 7320 , beat the record !

System Requirements

Minimum Specs:

Windows
  • CPU Cores: Single Core
  • Minimum RAM: 128 MB
  • DirectX Version: 7.0
  • Graphics Card RAM: 128 MB
  • Graphics Card: 7.0
  • Graphics Card Shader Model: Not Required
  • Sound Card: None
  • CPU Speed: 500 MHz
  • Operating System: Windows XP (32/64-bit). Windows Vista (32/64-bit). Windows 7 (32/64-bit).
